name: Sitecore
text:
Sitecore should be your choice. 
 Best For: Enterprise-level organizations needing extensive customization and scalability.

name: Umbraco
text:
Umbraco should be your choice. 
 Best For: Mid-sized businesses and organizations looking for an open-source, flexible CMS.

name: Kontent.ai
text:
Kontent.ai should be your choice. 
 Best For: Businesses seeking a headless CMS for modern, multi-channel content delivery.

name: WordPress
text:
WordPress should be your choice. 
 Best For: Small to large businesses looking for an easy-to-use, highly extendable CMS with a vast ecosystem.
